::DrillBit::

"Killfest, respond to him. Stall him as long as you can. Dark Mouse try
to regain complete computer control."
He opened a comm on incodded channels to his troops.
"Both Megatron claims to have computer control, and he says he will
destroy us with the enviormental systems. Although we have computer
control, we cant take the chance. He might not be bluffing. Your orders
are to attack them now. Hard and fast! Destroy them wile we still
control the internal defences."
He turned back to StarScream.
"What do you say? Want to go kick some Megatron ass?"
